name: Ninja Swing
description:
A game I've been developing as a fun project. This one's based on a game pitch I've worked in a contest I've joined before. 

The game is designed for mobile, but I've worked a PC version for people to test it out. Once in a while, I will update this and add some interesting stuff.

Being a one-tap mobile game, the mechanics are simple: 

  • Left-click to create a rope and swing.  Releasing left-click causes the player to throw shurikens.
  • Right-click allows you to dash. 
  • Bump gems to collect smaller ones for points and avoid the monsters.
